data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Feyenoord's Nick Marsman has been booked in Emmen.
In the minute 4, An attacking Emmen player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Anco Jansen smashes in a penalty at De Oude Meerdijk. The score is now 1-0.
At De Oude Meerdijk, Nick Bakker has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 35, Dick Advocaat (Feyenoord) is making a first substitution, with Naoufal Bannis replacing Steven Berghuis.
At De Oude Meerdijk, Anco Jansen is shown a red card and sent off.
Miguel Araujo for Emmen has been booked by Bjorn Kuipers and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 40, Penalty! Bjorn Kuipers points to the spot, great chance for Feyenoord...
Goal! The away team are now level through a Mark Diemers penalty.
Goal! Emmen have got their heads in front thanks to a Michael de Leeuw strike.
In the minute 42, Glenn Bijl instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Jens Toornstra levels the score at 2-2.
Great play from Luciano Narsingh to set up the goal.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Michael de Leeuw (Emmen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Hilal Ben Moussa (Emmen) has replaced the possibly injured Glenn Bijl.
The away team replace Bryan Linssen with Eric Botteghin.
Lutsharel Geertruida is replacing Bart Nieuwkoop for the away team.
That's full-time at De Oude Meerdijk. The final score is 2-3.
Michael Chacon (Emmen) has received a yellow card from Bjorn Kuipers.
Naoufal Bannis scores with a header and the away team now lead 2-3.
That's a fine assist from Lutsharel Geertruida.
